item.title: LBRT
item.description: score:39 Chances: The average of price targets set by Wall Street analysts indicates a potential upside of 27.1% in Liberty Oilfield Services (LBRT). The Board of Directors has increased its share repurchase authorization to $750 million, indicating confidence in the company’s future prospects.
